message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  Would you consider $8,500?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. How about we settle on $9,000?
